SELECT UR.UR_NO, UR.U_USERNAME, UR.B_NO,B.C_USERNAME, UR.UR_DATE, UR.S_NOSTART, S1.S_NAME S_NAMESTART, UR.S_NOLAST, S2.S_NAME S_NAMELAST, UR.UR_STATE, U.U_TYPE FROM UR LEFT JOIN B ON UR.B_NO = B.B_NO LEFT JOIN U ON U.U_USERNAME = UR.U_USERNAME JOIN S S1 ON UR.S_NOSTART=S1.S_NO JOIN S S2 ON UR.S_NOLAST=S2.S_NO ORDER BY UR.UR_NO DESC
